properties.entry: SELECT FOLDER_NO ,FOLDER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE FROM FOLDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND UP_FOLDER_NO IS NULL
SELECT FOLDER_NO ,FOLDER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE FROM FOLDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND UP_FOLDER_NO = ?
SELECT FOLDER_NO ,FOLDER_NAME ,CREATE_DATE ,UP_FOLDER_NO FROM FOLDER WHERE UP_FOLDER_NO = (SELECT UP_FOLDER_NO FROM FOLDER WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND FOLDER_NO = ?)
SELECT I.POST_NO,TITLE,POST_DATE FROM INTEREST_POST I JOIN POST P ON(I.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN FOLDER F ON (F.FOLDER_NO = I.FOLDER_NO) WHERE I.FOLDER_NO IS NULL AND I.MEMBER_NO=?
SELECT I.POST_NO,TITLE,POST_DATE FROM INTEREST_POST I JOIN POST P ON(I.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN FOLDER F ON (F.FOLDER_NO = I.FOLDER_NO) WHERE I.FOLDER_NO = ? AND I.MEMBER_NO= ?

SELECT I.POST_NO,TITLE,POST_DATE FROM INTEREST_POST I JOIN POST P ON(I.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) LEFT JOIN FOLDER F ON (F.FOLDER_NO = I.FOLDER_NO) WHERE NVL(I.FOLDER_NO,0) = (SELECT NVL(UP_FOLDER_NO,0) UP_FOLDER_NO FROM FOLDER WHERE FOLDER_NO = ?) AND I.MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT L.POST_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,TITLE ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,COUNT ,POST_DATE FROM LIKE_POST L JOIN MEMBER M ON(L.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN POST P ON(L.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE L.MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT POST_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,TITLE ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,COUNT ,POST_DATE FROM POST P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE P.MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT COMMENT_NO ,CATEGORY_NAME ,COMMENT_CONTENT ,MEMBER_NICKNAME ,COMMENT_DATE ,TITLE FROM COMMENT_TABLE CT JOIN POST P ON(CT.POST_NO = P.POST_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(CT.COMMENT_WRITER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON(P.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE CT.COMMENT_WRITER_NO = ? AND CT.STATUS = 'Y'
